name: Add Google Sheets rows from Typeform responses after validating emails with MailboxValidator
description: Every time a new response is submitted in Typeform, Make will automatically validate the email from that response using MailboxValidator. If the email is verified it will add the form's output to a specific Google Sheet. If the email is not verified it will add the data to a different Google Sheet. This example uses (this sheet)[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1I_0ORbuaKUyehO5qj7l3iWRNYELfAuG5lQzLfyuSw9A/edit#gid=0].
